selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the diagram and understand the geometric relationships between the circle, chords, and angles.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to identify spatial relationships in the diagram, such as intersections and midpoints.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the calculated angle to one of the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to match the calculated angle of ∠F to the given multiple-choice options.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_angle_in_circle
new_skill_specs.purpose: To calculate unknown angles in a circle using given angles and geometric properties.
